Welcome to Leftovers

At Leftovers, we're committed to providing you the evening of a lifetime. Whether you're diving into our exquisitely delicious de-thawed turkey dinner frozen from last Thanksgiving, or our signature "Whats-in-the-Fridge" salad, we promise to delight your palate.
